author: abstractalgorithms
message:
feat: Enhance Post Editor with auto-generated slug, validation, and preview functionality

style: Revamp Post and Series pages with improved layouts, gradients, and shadows

fix: Update Search page styles for better user experience and loading indicators

style: Refine Badge System UI with enhanced stats overview and progress bar

feat: Add Admin link to Footer for easier navigation to post management

style: Improve Header and User Menu aesthetics with consistent sizing and hover effects

style: Update Series Navigation and Timeline components for a more polished look

chore: Add wireframes for dashboard, edit post, manage posts, search results, view post, and view series
